body.p: You can use one of two license types with :

ol.li: A named-user license may be use by a single named user on onr or more computers. Named user licenses are not transferable to a new named user. If you order multiple named-user licenses, you will receive a single license key good of a specified number of named users. It is your reponsibility to keep track of the named users that each license is assigned to.

A floating license may be used by any user on any machine within a TCP/IP network. However, the total number of copies of in use at one time must not be more than the number of floating licenses available. A user who runs two different distributions of (for example Standalone and Eclipse Plugin) at the same time on the same computer, consumes a single floating license.
